name: Happy Hair Conditioner
description:
Happy Hair Conditioner: no rules! use as much as you want! carpe diem! have fun! be free!

This is a super moisturizing conditioner made with the most amazing ingredients that hair literally craves for: japanese camellia kissi oil, wild babassu oil, avocado butter, olive oil, aloe butter and the sweetest scent! You can use as much as you want and however you like - as a deep conditioning treatment, as a leave in conditioner or as a hair balm to braid, twist or style hair. Just do you!
